column4: if smbdy is a bit more clever - they can meet folks in the OT channel and then pm to get the skype ID.. but that takes them having a bit of common sence.. heheh

is there some technical reson why sometimes there are loads of users listen here and in #ubuntu+1 but for ages no dialoge at all on the +1 channel?? has this anything to do with irc-netsplits or similar...?
or is it just that more dialogue runs there than there...?
slightly off-topic, but there are many who run a detatchable irc client that is joined to the channel but they themselves don't attend the irc chat all the time.
